info.title: BitlyIP
info.description: Bitly is the most widely trusted link management platform in the world. By using the Bitly API, you will exercise the full power of your links through automated link customization, mobile deep linking, and click analytics.

get.description: Returns metrics by referring networks for the specified group's links.
get.summary: Get group metrics by referring networks

parameters.name: group_guid
parameters.description: A GUID for a Bitly group

get.description: Returns the tags currently used in the specified group. Maximum 1000.

parameters.name: group_guid
parameters.description: A GUID for a Bitly group

get.description: Get number of clicks on Bitlinks in a group.

parameters.name: group_guid
parameters.description: A GUID for a Bitly group

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: A unit of time

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. pass -1 to return all units of time.

parameters.name: unit_reference
parameters.description: An ISO-8601 timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics. Will default to current time.

get.description: Returns the click counts for the specified link in an array based on a date.

parameters.name: bitlink
parameters.description: A Bitlink made of the domain and hash

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: A unit of time

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: An integer representing the time units to query data for. pass -1 to return all units of time.

parameters.description: An ISO-8601 timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics. Will default to current time.

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of Bitlinks for a group.

parameters.name: group_guid
parameters.description: A GUID for a Bitly group

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The quantity of items to be be returned

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Integer specifying the numbered result at which to start

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Custom keyword to filter on history entries

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The value that you would like to search

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch

parameters.name: modified_after
parameters.description: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether or not to include archived bitlinks

parameters.name: deeplinks
parameters.description: Filter to only Bitlinks that contain deeplinks

parameters.name: domain_deeplinks
parameters.description: Filter to only Bitlinks that contain deeplinks configured with a custom domain

parameters.name: campaign_guid
parameters.description: Filter to return only links for the given campaign GUID, can be provided

parameters.name: channel_guid
parameters.description: Filter to return only links for the given channel GUID, can be provided, overrides all other parameters

parameters.name: custom_bitlink
parameters.description: A Custom Bitlink made of the domain and keyword

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: filter by given tags

parameters.name: launchpad_ids
parameters.description: filter by launchpad id

parameters.name: encoding_login
parameters.description: Filter by the login of the authenticated user that created the Bitlink

patch.description: Bulk update can add or remove tags or archive up to 100 links at a time; The response includes a a list of Bitlink ids that were updated.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: The client ID of an OAuth app

auth_key.description: Auth key for syncing to destination

deactivated.description: False if sink should be activated

renew_deadline.description: date the domain must renew by

renew_auto.description: whether the domain is configured to automatically renew

expiration_protected.description: whether the domain is protected from expiration

consumable_features.description: an array of all of the organizations consumable features

access_features.description: an array of all of the organizations access features

TimeUnit.title: TimeUnit
TimeUnit.description: The unit of time queried for (minute, hour, day, week, month)

links.description: This is limited to 100 Bitlink ids

auth_key.description: Auth key for syncing to destination

id.description: Unique short id of sink file

DefaultConsumableFeature.title: DefaultConsumableFeature
DefaultConsumableFeature.description: The tier default values for a single consumable feature

qr_code.description: Data URI of QR Code image

group_guid.description: Always include a specific group and custom domain in your shorten calls.

hash.description: The backhalf of the underlying hash link

target_bitlink_id.description: The domain and backhalf of the underlying hash link

id.description: The domain and backhalf of the parent override

download_url.description: use this url with follow redirects to download the file

DefaultAccessFeature.title: DefaultAccessFeature
DefaultAccessFeature.description: The tier default values for a single access feature

unit_reference.description: data returned up to this reference timestamp

units.description: The number of units queried for

link.description: The fully qualified URL to the Override which is the Bitly link to use. Ex: https://foo.com/bar
